doc.text: Creates a new lazy value. the supplier will be called once when  the value is first retrieved.

doc.summary: Wraps a <ref cls="net/minecraft/util/LazyLoadedValue">LazyLoadedValue</ref> to a lazy value.
doc.text: Wraps a <ref cls="net/minecraft/util/LazyLoadedValue">LazyLoadedValue</ref> to a lazy value.
Gets the value. If not yet resolved, resolves the lazy value.

doc.summary: Gets a lazy value that will have the value of the lazy optional if present.
doc.text: Gets a lazy value that will have the value of the lazy optional if present. If not  it will have the value of this lazy value.

doc.summary: Gets a new lazy value that will hold the value of this lazy value applied to  the mapper function.
doc.text: Gets a new lazy value that will hold the value of this lazy value applied to  the mapper function. The mapper function will also get called lazy.

doc.summary: A lazy value that is resolved when it is first used.
doc.text: A lazy value that is resolved when it is first used.
